messages.title: Think Different. Think Plaid
messages.content: The London parties are planning deep cuts to Wales's budget and our public services. Experts recognise that Wales is already being short-changed by Westminster by over £300 million every year.

messages.title: Only Plaid will do this. Think about protecting the Welsh Budget.
messages.content: Our health and education services need to be protected from these severe cuts. Only Plaid will do this. Think about protecting the Welsh Budget.

messages.title: With a hung parliament a real possibility, Plaid is in a strong position to defend Wales from these severe cuts.
messages.content: We will put protecting the Welsh Budget at the top of our priority list.

messages.title: Plaid Cymru is the ONLY party which puts the needs of the people of Wales first!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plaid Cymru will fight to protect Welsh health and education services from budget cuts by London parties, ensuring that the budget shortfall of £300 million per year identified by experts is addressed.

issues.economy: Plaid Cymru will protect the Welsh economy by fighting budget cuts from Westminster.
issues.health: The party pledges to shield health services from severe cuts.

images.caption: Henry Jones-Davies pictured on campaign material
